topics.body:
GOD DAMN IT!

You know how x-men has a new movie out called, "days of future past"?  Guess what it's being criticized for?  Apparently it's being called "racist". . . Let that sink in for a moment. . . x-men; the franchise about how discrimination against minority groups and featuring a large assortment of minority groups(hell there's even gay x-men) and even going so far as depicting how reverse discrimination is not justified is being called racist.

I. . You. . I don't even. . I don't fucking even. .
